List Title: 210 native orchid species of the US, Canada and Greenland
Description of what the list contains: List of orchid species with metadata on conservation ran; red list status; and number of botanical gardens present
List Author: G. Krupnick; M. McCormick; T. Mirenda; D. Whigham
Source: Krupnick et al. (2013). Ann. Missouri Bot. Gard 99: 180-198
Keywords: Red list; endangered species; orchids; Canada; USA
